snippet: Gov. John Kitzhaber on Monday asked the state’s attorney general to look into influence-peddling allegations surrounding his fiancée’s work for advocacy organizations.
abstract: Oregon Gov John Kitzhaber sends letter to state Atty Gen Ellen Rosenblum asking her to investigate influence-peddling allegations surrounding advocacy work of Kitzhaber's fiancee Cylvia Hayes.
lead_paragraph: Gov. John Kitzhaber on Monday asked the state’s attorney general to look into influence-peddling allegations surrounding his fiancée’s work for advocacy organizations.

headline.main: Oregon: Governor Relents on Scrutiny of Fiancée
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Governor Relents on Scrutiny of Fiancée
